CodeList.Name: Tumor Identification Results

Description.TranslatedText: Terminology relevant to tumor identification results.

EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCDefinition: The identification of a tumor that is present at baseline, is measurable and is the primary target of the therapeutic intervention.

The identification of a tumor or site of disease that is present at baseline and not considered a target tumor, but may be part of the objective assessment of the response to the therapeutic intervention.
The identification of a tumor which has not been previously seen or characterized.

CodeList.nciodm:PreferredTerm: CDISC SDTM Tumor Identification Result Terminology
